description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Papercraft Monsters is a first-person-shooter for 1 to 4 players to play either against each other or co-operatively against hordes of cartoon monsters. The single-player and co-operative modes see players use a selection of weapons to face off against waves of fiendish ghouls attacking from all directions.
description.short: Papercraft Monsters is a first-person-shooter for 1 to 4 players to play either against each other or co-operatively against hordes of cartoon monsters. The single-player and co-operative modes see players use a selection of weapons to face off against waves of fiendish ghouls attacking from all directions.
